New policy

Policies

Policies are stated positions on a particular issue. For example "Process asylum seekers offshore", or "Legalise same sex marriage". Each policy has a definition and a way to vote in relevant divisions in Parliament.

Policy Votes (unedited)
Marriage equality 1
Offshore processing 2 (1)
provisional (provisional) 1 (1)

That makes 3 policies which have voted in at least one division.

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.

The Whip on the Web

  • Twitter
Other projects by us that you might find interesting:
OpenAustralia, Election Leaflets, Right To Know and Planning Alerts.
The Public Whip is a not-for-profit, open source, project. Get the source code.
